AlertTime.description: Range of time that an alert may be in effect

start.description: Integer POSIX timestamp - required if container "times" key is present

end.description: Integer POSIX timestamp - if there is currently no end time planned for the alert, this key can be omitted indicating that there is no currently scheduled end time for the alert

Alert.description: An alert object indicating a system alert

alert_id.description: ID - unique identifier for this alert

times.description: Array of alert times indicating when the alert is in effect (e.g. when the system or station is actually closed, or when it is scheduled to be moved). If this array is omitted then the alert should be displayed as long as it is in the feed.

station_ids.description: If this is an alert that affects one or more stations, include their ids, otherwise omit this field. If both station_ids and region_ids are omitted, assume this alert affects the entire system

region_ids.description: If this system has regions, and if this alert only affects certain regions, include their ids, otherwise, omit this field. If both station_ids and region_ids are omitted, assume this alert affects the entire system

url.description: URL where the customer can learn more information about this alert, if there is one

summary.description: A short summary of this alert to be displayed to the customer

description.description: Detailed text description of the alert

last_updated.description: Integer POSIX timestamp indicating the last time the info for the particular alert was updated

SystemAlertsData.description: Object containing the data fields for this response

alerts.description: Array - alert objects each indicating a separate system alert

last_updated.description: Integer POSIX timestamp indicating the last time the data in this feed was updated

ttl.description: Integer representing the number of seconds before the data in this feed will be updated again (0 if the data should always be refreshed)
